patterns: I've few doubts, can you clear it out?
responses:
There is a lot I can help with.
  1. I can make your day relaxed & peaceful. Just play this audio & enjoy the peace.
  2. I can clear your queries related to Inner explorer, Mindfulness & Programs etc.

patterns: Can you explain the term mindfulness in brief?
responses:
Mindfulness is paying attention to the present moment with curiosity and kindness. 
It is a daily practice that promotes mental health and flexibility.

Inner Explorer is the only audio-guided mindfulness program in education that is formulated on the world renowned Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction (MBSR) protocol. Inner Explorer is the world leader in the delivery of MBSR- based daily mindfulness practice in schools. For more info:- About Us

patterns: How many mindfulness programs are there?
responses:
Our mindfulness Programs are basically categorized in 3 stages:-
  1. COMMUNITY-Best Suited for a Single School to bring a daily mindfulness program in every classroom.
  2. DISTRICT-Best Suited for a large scale implementation across the School District for daily mindfulness practice.
  3. CLOUD-Best Suited for a Single School to bring daily mindfulness programs to every classroom, and engage Parents / Caregivers.
Get more detail:- Our Programs

'Stay safe,stay healthy'

patterns: Can you share some experiences of the people?
responses:
Sure,
1.Director of Special Ed and Student Support:-
'We had just started IE a few months prior to the marathon bombing in Boston. Third grade was particularly traumatized as that was the grade that lost Martin. By continuing to participate in IE each day after the bombing, IE served as good trauma first-aid for several reasons: Maintaining familiar routines and rituals Ongoing teaching of calm down strategies. A safe space and sense of security. Helped teachers and students with self-care'. 
2. Ileana Mellan, Principal, Mater Academy:- 'Inner Explorer is very user friendly and easy to implement. We have seen a dramatic increase in the positive behaviors of the students in the classrooms where the program is done with fidelity. The investment of 5-10 minutes daily, comes back to you exponentially! Programs such as this should be required in all schools!'

Great! It's as easy as 1,2,3.
  1. Select the program that fits your needs.
  2. Invite all the teachers to join your program.
  3. Step3- Just press play to practice everyday.

patterns: what is the effect of IE?
responses:
The results showed that stress is reduced by 43% and disruptive behavior is reduced by 60%.
In addition, grade point averages (GPA's) are improved by 15% and grades in key subjects like reading, math and science are improved by over 20%.
In fact, the independent experts from BRAINFUTURES assessed evidence-based interventions that improve student's Brain Fitness' and academic outcomes. 
Inner Explorer is selected  as one of the TOP 10 programs that improves students Executive Functioning, which is a stronger predictor of school success than any other factor including IQ!

patterns: What are the advantages of mindfulness?
responses:
Mindfulness is paying attention to the present moment with curiosity and kindness.
Daily mindfulness practices improve attention, behavior, creativity and resilience to bolster all learning. It reduces stress, boosts up the immune system. With mindfulness the brain‚Äôs ability to process and think is improved. Plus, increased awareness of thoughts and feelings further reduces reactivity and strengthens the relaxation response which reduces the heart rate and calms other body systems.

patterns: My child is 13 years old, he remains very distrubed/stressed, how can mindfulness help him?
My child is little but he is very aggressive, would mindfulness practice work for him?
responses:
Yes! of course, Daily mindfulness practice teaches kids the practical techniques to appropriately handle difficult emotions such as stress, anxiety, anger etc and create a mental peace.
